assertions.assertion: The pthread_attr_setstack() shall set the thread creation stack stacksize in the attr ojbect.
The stacksize attribute shall define the minimum stack size (in bytes) allocated for the created thread stack.
If success, it returns zero and stores the stacksize attribute in the stacksize if successful.

if fail, an error number shall be returned to indicate the error. The pthread_attr_setstacksize() function shall fail if: [EINVAL] The value of stacksize is less than {PTHREAD_STACK_MIN} or exceeds an implementation-defined limit.
Shall not return an error code of [EINTR]
